name: AEGIS 2186
description: Take command of the ultimate weapon and defend mankind in AEGIS 2186. Protect Earth from an overwhelming alien assault in this intense retro arcade survival-shooter.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or newer Processor: 2 Ghz Quad-Core / 3.5 Ghz Dual-Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 6850 / Nvidia GTX 560 Storage: 1 GB available space
